person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Indian rubber demand is seen outpacing local production in the 1996/97 April / March season and the trend will persist way into the next century , the chairman of the Rubber Board of India said on Friday .

Let's think step by step.
1. The chairman of the Rubber Board of India.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.
1. The chairman of the Rubber Board of India.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| The chairman of the Rubber Board of India |

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Indian rubber demand is seen outpacing local production in the 1996/97 April / March season and the trend will persist way into the next century , the chairman of the Rubber Board of India said on Friday .

Let's think step by step.

1. India
2. 1996/97 April / March season (This could be considered as a temporal location, but since it's closely related to the rubber industry in India during that specific time frame, it can also be considered as a part of the first location)
3. Next century (This is a temporal location, indicating the future)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

1. India
2. 1996/97 April / March season
3. Next century

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location |
| --- |
| India |
| 1996/97 April / March season |
| Next century |
